mapper.select: select m.*, u.id 'muid',u.username 'musername',u.name 'mname', r.id 'rid',r.content 'rcontent',r.createtime 'rcreatetime', d.id 'ruid',d.username 'rusername',d.name 'rname' from message m left join dq1401 u on u.id = m.uid left join (reply r left join dq1401 d on d.id=r.uid) on m.id=r.mid order by m.createtime desc
